description: Smallest nontrivial extension of n which is a square.
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
maple: # Program which computes 20000 terms, from _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 24 2015for b from 1 to 20000 dosw1:=-1:for p from 1 to 6 dobp:=b*10^p;for i from 0 to 10^p-1 doif issqr(bp+i) then lprint(b,bp+i); sw1:=1; break; fi;                       od:if sw1 > 0 then break; fi;                 od:if sw1 < 0 then lprint("failed at b = ",b); fi;                      od:
author: _Patrick De Geest_
